--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Betrayed by the Romans, captured into slavery, reborn as a gladiator. The classic tale of the Republic's most famous rebel of Rome comes alive in visceral new series called Spartacus: Blood and Sand. Torn from his homeland and the woman he loves, Spartacus is condemned to live in the brutal world of the arena where blood and death are fun crowd. But not all battles are fought in the sand. Treachery, corruption, and the allure of sensual pleasures constantly will test Spartacus. To survive, he must become more than a man, more than a gladiator. He must become a legend.
